post.description:
Create a new project for document management.

- **name**: Project name (required)
- **description**: Optional project description
- **chunk_size**: Size of text chunks for RAG (default: 1000)
- **chunk_overlap**: Overlap between chunks (default: 200)

Note: Changing chunk_size or chunk_overlap will not affect existing documents.
Use the re-ingest endpoint to reprocess documents with new settings.

delete.description:
Permanently delete a project and all its documents.

This action:
- Deletes all document files from storage
- Removes all vectors from the vector database
- Deletes all database records

This action cannot be undone.

post.description:
Query documents in a project using RAG.

This endpoint:
1. Retrieves relevant document chunks based on the question
2. Uses an LLM to generate an answer with citations
3. Returns the answer with source citations

Parameters:
- **project_id**: The project to query
- **question**: Your question (1-2000 characters)
- **document_ids**: Optional filter to specific documents
- **retrieval_strategy**: How to retrieve chunks (similarity, mmr, hybrid)
- **top_k**: Number of chunks to retrieve (1-20)

Find document chunks similar to the provided text.

This is useful for:
- Finding related content
- Checking if similar information exists
- Exploring document content
